alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Walsh and south central Pembina Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Veseleyville, or 11 miles southwest of Grafton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Voss around 820 PM CDT. Mandt around 825 PM CDT. Nash, Grafton and Oakwood around 830 PM CDT. Auburn and Cashel around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Thomas. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 181 and 185. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
